title: Me boycott league
body: I no buy league merch because i get banned!!!!

replies.body: Well I dont know whether you got banned for legitimate reasons or not so I wont speak for your situation but Im refraining from spending any more money on this game because Riot suspended my account and refuses to look into the situation despite me sending tickets with proof
Me banned for saying N-word in post game lobby when me was only one left in lobby!!!!! EXPLAIN

> EXPLAIN

Or 30+ times with people in lobby.
There were no one in the post-game lobby except my premade whom i know in real life.

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Barrél,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2018-10-03T19:59:31.309+0000)
>
> There were no one in the post-game lobby except my premade whom i know in real life.

Then maybe some of your friends secretly hate you using that kind of language, did that occur to you?

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=00030000000100000000,timestamp=2018-10-03T20:03:12.977+0000)
>
> Then maybe some of your friends secretly hate you using that kind of language, did that occur to you?

No im 100% sure he didn't report me. (he's also sitting next to me trying to help me)

a riot employee just told you youre wrong.
so shut up and accept it you wont get any clearer answers

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Barrél,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2018-10-03T19:59:31.309+0000)
>
> There were no one in the post-game lobby except my premade whom i know in real life.

1. I would also like to hear you explain your chat before postgame, which you seem to be convienently dodging.
2. I think Riot Tantram checked premade chat before making that statement, and you aren't addressing the pattern he pointed out, just that one game, which leads me to believe that you are lying.  Keep in mind Tantram can tell which players are in a premade, and knows when players leave post game chat.  

Does this count as a {{summoner:11}}?
Funny you assume a Rioter doing his job when he already proved to create a trash system :D
It being a trash system or not is an opinion.
When some people get banned for really NOTHING, and the trolls are left to roam around and ruin games, then it's kinda objectively a trash system.

>When some people get banned for really NOTHING, and the trolls are left to roam around and ruin games, then it's kinda objectively a trash system.

You're not being objective about it at this point. False positive rate, false negative rate, speed of response, and what is reasonably possible to limit the first two while maximizing the third.

This isn't a system where you can just scream "FIX IT WITH ZERO NEGATIVES!" and have some programmer snap their fingers to make an impossible program.

Objectively, the system is functioning. It's banning people with poor behavior quickly while having an extremely low false positive rate. False negatives is probably the least important statistic where the other two being much more important, and the system is accomplishing just that.

With soft inters the system has less than 10% success rate. (Not even the support gives a fck about soft inters...) So no matter how you try to prove this is a good system, this is simply trash. Overpunishing not gameplay related issues, and simply not caring about the gameplay related ones.... (Exception the hard int, but even a toddler could make a system to catch hard inters)

Yup, failure to accomplish something means you "don't care" about it.
It really is a shame nobody cares about fusion reactors, cures for aids and cancer, or world peace.

If you have an idea in how to detect soft inters with a high enough specificity, and a higher sensitivity than the current system, I'm sure Riot would be more than glad to implement it.
When after 2 manual reviews the support does not take any action, i'm sure, they do not care :)

Or maybe the people **you** identified as soft inters are not as easily identifiable as soft inters as you personally think.
This wouldn't be the first time anybody on the forums has jumped the gun and cried wolf on somebody who just as easily could have had a bad game.
It's also very probable that some people will get away with soft inting because they were given the benefit of the doubt. That scenario, too, is fairly plausible.
So just because they didn't come to the conclusion that you did, doesn't mean they don't care.

Besides that I strongly doubt you've been informed of an actual manual review happening, and more likely been informed that the case is being handled… which likely means it has been added to a queue of cases that still need to be manually checked.
And given that more recent cases are preferred (since Riot typically doesn't want to punish people for something they did half a year ago) it could simply be that this particular case will never even **be** reviewed. And not because they don't care about the general problem, but because they don't care about **your** case anymore than they care about **any other** case.

The only way for Riot to manually deal with players that are **currently** feeding is to essentially ignore some portion of the reported cases. Otherwise all they do is deal with last year's feeders.

I listed all the explanations I could think of given the limited information I had. Information that could only possibly have been provided by you.

Deciding not to tell me something because you thought it wasn't important is fine.
Forgetting to tell me something is also fine.
Not telling me something (for whatever reason) and then sarcastically pointing it out as if I should have known it already is really just childish and nonsensical.

You have yet to address the point that takes up more than half of my post, btw.

Diamond ranked, Janna assigned bottom, going top (starting with ONLY boots), trying to steal the toplaners farm, dying 10 times in 18 minutes, randomly ulting (only minions nearby, multiple times) and flashing. Ye, it was probably just a bad game, you must be right -_-
So I reiterate. You're not being objective. It's more evident since your argument contains more opinions and bitterness than actual analysis.

> [{quoted}](name=Phoenixdust,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=000300000001000000010000,timestamp=2018-10-03T21:08:26.619+0000)
>
> Funny you assume a Rioter doing his job when he already proved to create a trash system :D

I think Tantram checked because he cares about false positives in his system.

> 2. I think Riot Tantram checked premade chat before making that statement, and you aren't addressing the pattern he pointed out, just that one game, which leads me to believe that you are lying.  Keep in mind Tantram can tell which players are in a premade, and knows when players leave post game chat.  
> 
> Does this count as a {{summoner:11}}?

I posted my entire chat logs (here they are again https://imgur.com/a/X6sedIP) I also cant seem to understand what you are saying. Are you implying that im lying about the fact that there were no others except me and my premade in the post-game lobby or are you saying something else?

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Barrél,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=000300000001000000010001,timestamp=2018-10-03T21:15:42.424+0000)
>
> I posted my entire chat logs (here they are again https://imgur.com/a/X6sedIP) I also cant seem to understand what you are saying. Are you implying that im lying about the fact that there were no others except me and my premade in the post-game lobby or are you saying something else?

Im implying that you are lying about only saying the n-word in front of your premade.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2018-10-03T19:58:08.685+0000)
>
> Or 30+ times with people in lobby.

{{summoner:11}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2018-10-03T19:58:08.685+0000)
>
> Or 30+ times with people in lobby.

Sir, u need a bonus for this {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
Someone reported you before leaving the lobby, and when you left the lobby what you'd said there was noticed by the system.
But i didnt say anything offensive in game and none of the toxic stuff was ever seen by anyone except me.

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Barrél,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-03T19:46:02.298+0000)
>
> But i didnt say anything offensive in game and none of the toxic stuff was ever seen by anyone except me.

The terms of use don't say "don't use objectionable language when someone else can see it." They say "don't use objectionable language."
Well also do you have chat logs of the game? This way we can see

https://imgur.com/cu9bG06

RITO like nice players. RITO NO LIKE TOXIC. **RITO SMASH TOXIC!!!!**

https://media.giphy.com/media/k9kKWKaUEDBM4/giphy.gif
chat logs or didn't happen
Mundo approve.

From Riot Tantram:

> [We don't want money from toxic players. We want them to stop playing.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/d2M1uX57-instant-noreason-permanent-ban?comment=000400030003)

If you have your chat logs we can take a look, but their policy is that if you are banned for toxicity they don't *want* your money.

Here are the chat logs. As i said i wasn't toxic in game i only spammed a bad word in the post-game lobby when there was no one there except my premade who i know in real life. We were just having banter, knowing no one would see it except us.

(you have to open the link for the entire logs)

https://imgur.com/a/X6sedIP

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Barrél,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-10-03T19:58:25.389+0000)
>
> Here are the chat logs. As i said i wasn't toxic in game i only spammed a bad word in the post-game lobby when there was no one there except my premade who i know in real life. We were just having banter, knowing no one would see it except us.
> 
> (you have to open the link for the entire logs)
> 
> https://imgur.com/a/X6sedIP
> 
> {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Yeah, that's 100% not okay. You agreed to the terms of use, which tell you NOT to use that sort of language. They don't say "it's fine if no one else is in the lobby."

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2018-10-03T20:06:31.920+0000)
>
> Yeah, that's 100% not okay. You agreed to the terms of use, which tell you NOT to use that sort of language. They don't say "it's fine if no one else is in the lobby.

But no one's getting hurt by it.

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Barrél,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-03T20:11:53.242+0000)But no one's getting hurt by it.

That doesn't mean you get a free pass to break the rules, or that your racist language is at all permissible in League. Riot expects you to behave in the way you agreed to, and spewing racial slurs on their client is NOT in keeping with that.
Why write it at all?

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Barrél,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-10-03T19:58:25.389+0000)
>
> Here are the chat logs. As i said i wasn't toxic in game i only spammed a bad word in the post-game lobby when there was no one there except my premade who i know in real life. We were just having banter, knowing no one would see it except us.
> 
> (you have to open the link for the entire logs)
> 
> https://imgur.com/a/X6sedIP
> 
> {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Maybe you got banned for saying the n-word 30 times in post.
Racial slurs are against the rules, even if no one can see it.
What.... what would possess you to say a racial slur 30+ times?  Even if you were completely alone, why?

> [{quoted}](name=MegaLobunny,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-10-03T21:27:02.850+0000)
>
> What.... what would possess you to say a racial slur 30+ times?  Even if you were completely alone, why?

I'm just venting some anger from the game i played. I thought it'd be better if i did it in post-game lobby chat when everyone had left instead of saying it in-game where it actually would've offended people.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4BEZ8Gr,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2018-10-03T19:58:08.685+0000)
>
> Or 30+ times **with people in lobby**.

That wasn’t what I meant.  You could’ve vented by saying anything but instead you chose to say a racial slur.  Most people just curse when mad.  If your go to is to say slurs then I think you have some re-evaluating to do.
I haven't bought RP since my first ban in season 4 lol
I think Riot will be okay. But let me know if it turns out I'm wrong and you seriously manage to put them in financial trouble.

Looks to me like you probably got reported by someone other than your premade for saying things like, "I f***ing pinged you" and overall being a pretty rude teammate. Then when the bot scanned the chat logs it found you repeatedly saying the things you did and passed judgement accordingly.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Yeah, and I’m boycotting the women’s bathroom.
what RP?
